modName: Marry a female Khajiit - Brelyna Maryon becomes Khajiit
summary: I basically just changed Brelyna Maryon, a possible marriage candidate, into a Khajiit. :)
descriptionHtml:
Hi all!

I wanted to have a Khajiit to marry for my Khajiit character. Simplest solution seemed to be to just change one of the already possibly wives into a Khajiit. I picked Brelyna Maryon from the College of Winterhold since my character is a Mage and so is she.

I kept every single setting the same, I only changed the race option, it didn\'t touch the sliders to modify how she looks either so its just how she would look as a Khajiit with the same slider positions. I may mess with the sliders later on but for now I think she looks fine as is. She still has the same voice, I would have changed it to Khajiit but I believe there is an issue with using Khajiit voices on a character you can marry as they never recorded Khajiit voice marriage dialogue. To me her voice seems to fit her well as a Khajiit anyhow, just no \"raspyness\" to the voice as in a normal Khajiit.

I made this for my own personal use but decided to share it with anyone interested in such a mod. :)

I haven\'t done much testing yet so use at your own risk. I don\'t \"believe\" it should cause any issues since I didn\'t touch any other settings other than race. I\'ll update this description after awhile of testing to let you know how it went.

Final thoughts;
If anyone really wants me to change her, or another NPC, to a different race for them in a new mod I suppose I could. Sorry if I don\'t get back to you right away though. Again, I must mention that I\'m not completely positive changing a certain NPC\'s race will cause any issues down the line as I\'ve had little time to test but I don\'t think it should.

And PLEASE LET ME KNOW, if you find any issues or bugs with this mod. Thank you!

This mod does NOT require a new game, she will change even if your right next to her in your save.

Enjoy and take care. :)
author: Skydog287
